name: tiddly-drive-2-app
description: Modernized Tiddly Drive 2 Google Drive app integration

scripts.icons:full: rsvg-convert -w 1024 branding/logo-full.svg > branding/png/logo-full-1024.png && rsvg-convert -w 1024 branding/logo-full-inverted.svg > branding/png/logo-full-inverted-1024.png && rsvg-convert -w 220 -h 140 branding/logo-full.svg > branding/png/logo-full-220x140.png && rsvg-convert -w 220 -h 140 branding/logo-full-inverted.svg > branding/png/logo-full-inverted-220x140.png
scripts.icons:ico: convert branding/png/icon-16.png branding/png/icon-32.png branding/png/icon-48.png branding/png/icon-64.png branding/png/icon-128.png branding/png/icon-256.png branding/png/favicon.ico
scripts.icons:all: pnpm run icons:clean && for s in 16 32 48 64 96 120 128 256 512; do WIDTH=$s pnpm run -s icons:single; done && pnpm run -s icons:full && pnpm run -s icons:ico
scripts.assets: pnpm run build && pnpm run icons:all
